short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Chrome extensions directly as CRX or ZIP files, giving you the flexibility to choose your preferred format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight, efficient tool for downloading Chrome and Edge extensions in both CRX and ZIP formats. Perfect for developers, researchers, and users who need offline access to extensions.

Features:
- Download extensions as CRX (installable package)
- Extract source code as ZIP
- Convert CRX to ZIP
- Support for Chrome & Edge stores
- Clean, simple interface

Download extensions for development, research, or offline access with just one click. No ads, no bloat - just functionality.
